title: Video: Michael Christmas – Outta’ Know
content:
Michael Christmas are fun personified. Embodying the spirit of Weezer with the gritty, fuzz laden tunes of Wavves, the Florida four piece are rapidly becoming one of my favourite new acts of 2011. Their new video for Outta’ Know is a vibrantly colourful affair, documenting the group performing the track in a cramped studio space, and still managing to have a raucous time. Shot in front of an ever changing backdrop of disco-inspired colours, it’s simplicity in it’s most enjoyable form. You get the impression that you could stick these guys in a room together with nothing but their equipment, and they’d still have the time of their lives, and possibly even write a few anthemic tracks. Check out the video for Outta’ Know below.

Michael Christmas – Outta’ Know from ryan zarra on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
